articles.headline: In U.S.-China Tech Feud, Taiwan Feels Heat From Both Sides
articles.snippet: The island’s biggest chip maker has been a coveted partner to both battling giants. But rising nationalism is making it harder to keep the middle ground.
articles.abstract: The island’s biggest chip maker has been a coveted partner to both battling giants. But rising nationalism is making it harder to keep the middle ground.
articles.lead_paragraph: TAINAN, Taiwan — The United States and China are wrestling to lead the world in artificial intelligence, 5G wireless and other cutting-edge technologies. But the real wizardry that makes those advancements possible is being performed on a yam-shaped island that sits between them, geographically and politically.

articles.headline: ‘A Battle for the Souls of Black Girls’
articles.snippet: Discipline disparities between Black and white boys have driven reform efforts for years. But Black girls are arguably the most at-risk student group in the United States.
articles.abstract: Discipline disparities between Black and white boys have driven reform efforts for years. But Black girls are arguably the most at-risk student group in the United States.
articles.lead_paragraph: BINGHAMTON, N.Y. — Zulayka McKinstry’s once silly, sociable daughter has stopped seeing friends, talking to siblings and trusting anyone — changes Ms. McKinstry dates to the day in January 2019 when her daughter’s school principal decided that “hyper and giddy” were suspicious behaviors in a 12-year-old girl.
articles.byline: By Erica L. Green, Mark Walker and Eliza Shapiro

articles.headline: Fraud Schemes Exploit Weak Spots in Unemployment Claims System
articles.snippet: Pandemic programs have lowered the barriers to collecting benefits, and the usual security methods haven’t kept up.
articles.abstract: Pandemic programs have lowered the barriers to collecting benefits, and the usual security methods haven’t kept up.
articles.lead_paragraph: The for-sale ad appeared last week in an underground internet bazaar that specializes in selling stolen accounts and data. It was for access to a filched unemployment insurance claim in California that had been approved and offered benefits worth $17,550.
